request.description:
Fetch a tournament the last number is going is the id.
The path is: https://localhost:4000/api/tournament/:id

response.name: https://localhost:4000/api/tournament/8
response.body:
{
    "ID": 8,
    "Title": "Tournament title here",
    "Location": "123 Main street",
    "TournamentDate": "2020-06-09T00:00:00Z",
    "MatchTimeStart": "1230",
    "MatchTimeEnd": "0000",
    "AdditionalInformation": "Additional information about the tournament here",
    "IsOnline": false,
    "TimeControl": "5+0",
    "TournamentType": "Swiss",
    "Rated": true,
    "Poster": "/tournament/img/Screenshot 2020-05-23 at 23.51.58.png",
    "TournamentContact": "test@example.com",
    "Created": "2020-06-08T11:49:08Z",
    "Expires": "2025-12-19T11:49:08Z"
}
